chapters.title: Prologue: By Grace and Banners Fallen
chapters.info: Captain Charlz Guybon, p. 50—Guardsman-Lieutenant, now promoted to Captain, in the Queen's Guards in Caemlyn. He hunted around for guards who were dismissed by Gaebril, finding over four thousand of them. Elayne promoted him to Captain because of his efforts, much to his embarrassment. He is handsome with greenish hazel eyes with a face suited to smiling.
